de.unlixx.runpng.scene.settings.effects

Class ThumbnailPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.GridPane
              • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.settings.AbstractSettingsPane
                • de.unlixx.runpng.scene.settings.effects.ThumbnailPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UndoListener, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ThumbnailPane
extends AbstractSettingsPane
    Implementation of a ThumbnailPane with control buttons to manipulate the scale of the viewed image. This pane will be used in the effect and generator panes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getViewImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getViewImage()
        Gets the image from the embedded ThumbnailView.
        Returns:
        The current Image of the ThumbnailView. Or null if none loaded.

        Returns:
        The new loaded Image.
